## Tender Details
Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) seek proposals from contractors for the provision of single engine light helicopter services, including pilots, engineers, and maintenance services to support the operations of the Polar Continental Shelf Program (PCSP).

The successful contractor will be required to provide the necessary helicopters and personnel to operate them for the duration of the contract. The helicopters will be used for passenger and cargo transport in the Arctic region.

To be considered, contractors must submit their proposals by the closing date. The successful contractor will be selected based on their ability to meet the requirements of the contract.
